thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: pouya

author: pouya
title: pouya
text: I was looking for a last minute flight from toronto to guadalajara mexico for my friends twin daughters communion. Unfortunately i have tried before however my family and i are very tight on money due to the canadian economy. I knew i could not miss this because they have requested me to be there godfather. I went on flight hub and searched for a fair price and even though i could not truly afford to go im still going thanks to flighhub! The search engine that connected me to all the most convenient flights were right around what i was looking for and the day i was looking for even though other sites were not giving me the option of flying the day i wanted. Thank you flighthub!
